issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for parquet date/time in int32/64 encoding
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4908](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4908). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The parquet data source does not support reading date/time types that are encoded in INT32/INT64 columns.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4908?focusedCommentId=16794946) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3940
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3940>
